markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Blood Booster](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1957)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=59" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 59 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This elixir bolsters your body's natural defenses and ability to resist maladies that travel through or affect blood. For 10 minutes you receive the listed resistance to [persistent bleed and persistent poison damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29), and you lower the DC for any flat checks to end persistent bleed or persistent poison damage as if you received particularly appropriate aid. 

At the GM's discretion, blood booster elixirs can also automatically [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) non-magical effects that specifically rely on thinning the drinker's blood, such as a [skull peeler's](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1306) anticoagulant.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

level="2"

>

</traits>

**Price** 9 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The resistance is 5.

pfs="Standard"
>

</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 59 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 225 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The resistance is 10.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 18"
pfs="Standard"
>
Blood Booster (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 59 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---
